alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Norfolk, eastern Worcester, south central Middlesex and north central Bristol Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hopedale, or over Milford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Norwood, Milford, Stoughton, Walpole, Mansfield, Easton, Canton, Norton, Sharon, Foxborough, Bellingham, Westwood, Holliston, Medway, Medfield, Norfolk, Wrentham, Plainville and Millis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern, central, southeastern and northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
